titleStmt.title: The master of the Temple as bad a lawyer as the Dean of Pauls is a divine in a letter from a gentleman of the Temple, to his (quondam) tutor in Oxford, about the law part of Dr. Sherlock's modest examiniation of the Oxford decree.
titleStmt.author: Shower, Bartholomew, Sir, 1658-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by E. Whitlock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
